about_the_game:
Step into the darkness of a haunting bedroom where your only ally is the faint beam of your flashlight. Paranoia is a psychological survival horror game that weaves a chilling tale of guilt, fear, and hidden truths. You are a man whose wife has been murdered—but your fragmented memories cast doubt on the real killer. Was it someone else, or is the truth more horrifying than you dare imagine?

Avoid the ominous presence of a mysterious woman as you uncover clues and piece together the events of that fateful night. Every shadow hides a secret, and every sound could be your last warning.

content_descriptors.notes: Not recommended for sensitive people, may cause nausea or panic attack
